name: Super Custom Online Flashcards!
description:
This is a flashcard game, which allows you to input your own list of questions and answers, which then it can ask you about in order to train your memory After giving an answer, you have to choose whether you answered correctly, kinda correctly or incorrectly. At the end of the game, you'll get a score, a grade and lists of answers that you knew, kinda knew and didn't know.

I've made this little app because I was looking for a flashcard game online that would allow me to add my own list of words and would grade me on them, but I was unable to find one. So, I decided to just make one myself! I hope you'll like it too!
